author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Michael Michel’s The Price of Power is a thick, multi-POV tome for fans of Joe Abercrombie’s First Law Trilogy and George R.R. Martin’s A Song of Ice and Fire. With an emphasis on character building, The Price of Power is an intricate, slow-burning, morally grey book one. “A trail of dark footprints followed them. Imprints […]

title: REVIEW: The Price of Power by Michael Michel
